review_data.title: Maybe the best business lunch available
review_data.content: I strongly recommend their business lunch menus for CHF 20 to 25. Fast service and excellent food. I went for the fish and it was delicious. Also very attractive is the offer coffee + sweetie for approx. CHF 6. Value for money is fantastic.

review_data.title: Great food, friendly atmosphere
review_data.content: Great place for lunch, packed though, so reservation recommended. Italian-Swiss food was very tasty and the chef was very flexible, allowing us to order something from the evening menu, even though they do a different lunch menu. Not cheap, but good value for money.
